channel.title: Server download list By-Lorenso
channel.description:
Hello people, in this topic i will post the server and the client download link. It saves alot of search time.*Request as sticky* Note:Almost all the client downloads are located on the forums most servers u need to register on forums before u can play. I will add more servers soon, but nobody wants to play dead servers, right?
[b]RSCEmulation - RuneScape Classic Private Server[/b] Forums:[url=http://www.rscemulation.net/]http://www.rscemulation.net/[/url]
[b]RSCDevil, rsc server with F2P and P2P on 1 client with linked DB[/b] Forums:[url=http://www.rscdevil.org]www.rscdevil.org[/url]
[b]Project P2P - New name, new server all based on the community. -- YOU[/b] Forums:[url=http://www.projectp2p.net]www.projectp2p.net[/url]
[b]★★☆ RoA - Project 3hit - BETA[/b] Forums:[url=http://ro-a.net]http://ro-a.net[/url] Webclient:[url=http://3hit.net/roa]http://3hit.net/roa[/url]
[b]FLAME SCAPE OBSIDIAN ARMOR|WEPONS! DEDI! [/b] Forums:[url=http://www.fsclassic.net/]http://www.fsclassic.net/[/url]
[b]RSCAngel - Over a year old - Biggest ever RSC Private server [/b] Forums:[url=http://rscangel.org/]http://rscangel.org/[/url]
[b]Realpk p2p pking server[/b] Forums:[url=http://realpk.info]http://realpk.info[/url]
[b]Admar-Online (Unique World / Landscape)[/b] Forums:[url=http://www.admar-online.com]www.admar-online.com[/url]
[b]Flamescape Classic Is Back![/b] Forums:[url=http://fsclassic.net]http://fsclassic.net[/url]
[b]DARscape** New Best RSC private Server[/b] Forums:[url=http://dargamingco.com/]http://dargamingco.com/[/url]
[b][Offical] KingPK TRUE 24/7 back to full F2P Pking[/b] Forums:[url=http://king-pk.com/]http://king-pk.com/[/url] Client:[url=http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zn0hylwgzyw]http://www.mediafire.com/download.php?zn0hylwgzyw[/url]
[b][RSC]Reenigne Classic[/b] Forums:[url=http://reenigne.ath.cx/rscd/index.php]http://reenigne.ath.cx/rscd/index.php[/url]
[b]run and pk, will be out in a couple of months, beta testing is over[/b] Forums:[url=http://theforums.net16.net/index.php]http://theforums.net16.net/index.php[/url]
[b]RSCRELOADED[/b] Forums:[url=http://rscevolution.com/]http://rscevolution.com/[/url]
[b]RscReloaded - Dedicated - Back ONLINE. Firewall - 60+ - READ[/b] Forums:[url=http://RscReloaded.net]http://RscReloaded.net[/url] [url=http://RscReloaded.com/]http://RscReloaded.com/[/url] Client:[url=http://rapidshare.com/files/239939385/client.zip]http://rapidshare.com/files/239939385/client.zip[/url]

item.title: Server download list By-Lorenso
item.dc:creator: @lorenso lorenso
item.description:
@lorenso wrote:

snoopy89:

ooommmfggg how to to rep??!?!?!?!??!?!

Under somebody’s name u will see Rep:*** Under that it says [Rep++] Click there to rep someone.

Read full topic
